Sent: Thursday, August 17, 2023 11:41:30 PM

  1.  Disable filters, stealth mode

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

4.1.101

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

www.ring.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

1. The Ring app continues to log me off. I searched ring KBs and found that AdGuard is the issue. I disabled AdBlock for ring and that did not fix the issue. I disabled AdGuard and that fixed the issue. I contacted Ring and they said that the issue is with AdGuard

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/158960#issuecomment-1678224314 `amazon-adsystem.com` is blocked, that's why the video can't be played.
There are some ways to handle it:
- Using our products which allow to filter HTML instead of or with AdGuard DNS
- Using Private DNS instead of AdGuard DNS where you can unblock `amazon-adsystem.com`
- Switching AdGuard DNS to its non-filtered version.

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.startribune.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.startribune.com%2F) ### Comment > StarTribune.com recently enabled a pop-up overlay that prevents visitors from interacting with the website. Normally you can view the homepage contents, but cannot view articles without being a member. Now you cannot even view the homepage. ### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.1.101

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

www.ring.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. The Ring app continues to log me off. I searched ring KBs and found that AdGuard is the issue. I disabled AdBlock for ring and that did not fix the issue. I disabled AdGuard and that fixed the issue. I contacted Ring and they said that the issue is with AdGuard

issue.title: gearspace.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://gearspace.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fgearspace.com) ### Comment > The fault prevents going to the second page of results when I search for something (shown in screenshots). > > This seems to be an issue with the tracking filters of various blockers. I have this exact problem with 1Blocker too. If I disable the tracking filters then going to the next page of results works. > > The problem is I can’t disable granularly - to make the site work I have to totally disable tracking protection. ### Screenshots
